001package org.consensusj.jsonrpc;
002
003/**
004 *  Exception wrapper for JsonRpcError
005 *  Useful in server implementations, throwing an error that will be transmitted
006 *  to the client.
007 *  TODO: See TODO in parent class {@link JsonRpcException}
008 * @see org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcException
009 */
010public class JsonRpcErrorException extends JsonRpcException {
011    private final JsonRpcError error;
012
013    public JsonRpcErrorException(JsonRpcError error) {
014        super(error.getMessage());
015        this.error = error;
016    }
017
018    public JsonRpcErrorException(JsonRpcError error, Throwable cause) {
019        super(error.getMessage(), cause);
020        this.error = error;
021    }
022
023    public JsonRpcErrorException(JsonRpcError.Error code, Throwable cause) {
024        super(code.getMessage() + ": " + cause.getMessage(), cause);
025        this.error = JsonRpcError.of(code, cause);
026    }
027
028    /**
029     * Get the JSON RPC Error POJO
030     * @return An error object
031     */
032    public JsonRpcError getError() {
033        return error;
034    }
035
036    public static JsonRpcErrorException of(JsonRpcError.Error code) {
037        return new JsonRpcErrorException(JsonRpcError.of(code));
038    }
039}
